images.mining.clustering

Class SingleImageSIFTClusterer

  • java.lang.Object
    • images.mining.clustering.SingleImageSIFTClusterer

  • public class SingleImageSIFTClusterer
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class enables the users to cluster the SIFT features on a single image and output the clusters in an ARFF format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Perform clustering of the SIFT features on an image.

      Performs the clustering across the specified cluster range of the SIFT features of an image and finds the optimal cluster configuration according to all supported cluster validity indices.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleImageSIFTClusterer

        public SingleImageSIFTClusterer()

      • SingleImageSIFTClusterer

        public SingleImageSIFTClusterer(java.lang.String inPath,
                        CombinedMetric cmet,
                        OptimalConfigurationFinder selector,
                        int minClusters,
                        int maxClusters)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        inPath - String that is the path to the ARFF file containing the image SIFT features.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.
        selector - OptimalConfigurationFinder for finding the optimal cluster configuration among all generated configurations.
        minClusters - Integer that is the minimal number of clusters to try and use.
        maxClusters - Integer that is the maximal number of clusters to try and use.

        SIFTRepresentation object that holds the features on the image.

      • clusterARFFToARFF

        public static void clusterARFFToARFF(java.lang.String inPath,
                     java.lang.String outPath,
                     int numClust)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform a single clustering run for a fixed number of clusters on the features loaded from an ARFF file and persist the clusters in an output ARFF file.
        Parameters:
        inPath - String that is the path to the ARFF file containing the image SIFT features.
        outPath -
        numClust -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • clusterImageByIndexProduct

        public Cluster[] clusterImageByIndexProduct()
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method performs the clustering and finds the optimal cluster configuration based on a product of different cluster validity indices.
        Returns:
        Cluster[] that is the cluster configuration produced by the clustering and selected as the optimal one.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • clusterImageAll

        public Cluster[][] clusterImageAll()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Performs the clustering across the specified cluster range of the SIFT features of an image and finds the optimal cluster configuration according to all supported cluster validity indices. It outputs all such optimal configurations.
        Returns:
        Cluster[][] containing the optimal reached cluster configurations of the SIFT features of an image, for all supported cluster validity indices.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • clusterImage

        public Cluster[] clusterImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
                     boolean simple)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Perform clustering of the SIFT features on an image.
        Parameters:
        bi - BufferedImage object that is the image where the SIFT features are being clustered. It is used in the adapted K-means, if the 'simple' flag is set to false, for extracting color information in neighborhoods of the keypoints.
        simple - Boolean flag indicating whether the basic K-means is used or the adapted version.
        Returns:
        Cluster[] that is the SIFT feature cluster configuration that is found to be optimal.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • persistClusters

        public static void persistClusters(java.lang.String outPath,
                   Cluster[] clusterConfiguration,
                   DataSet outDSet)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Persist the clusters in a specified ARFF file and at the same time fill a DataSet object from the Cluster[] cluster configuration array.
        Parameters:
        outPath - String that is the path to the output file for the cluster configuration.
        clusterConfiguration - Cluster[] that is the cluster configuration to persist.
        outDSet - DataSet object to fill with the features from the cluster configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public static void clusterImageDirectory(java.lang.String inPath,
                         java.lang.String outPath,
                         java.lang.String imagePath)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Recursively intra-cluster SIFT features in a directory of images.
        Parameters:
        inPath - Current input path to the features.
        outPath - Current output path for the cluster configurations.
        imagePath - Current image path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
